name: The Block
title: Utf8b8jutw Uniswap Labs Releases Unichain On
text:
Synopsis
Uniswap Labs launched Unichain, a Layer 2 solution aimed at improving Ethereum network security and reducing transaction manipulation, signaling continued innovation in blockchain infrastructure.

Key Insights
- Uniswap Labs released Unichain on mainnet, its Layer 2 scaling solution designed to minimize maximal extractable value (MEV) and accelerate Ethereum's rollup roadmap
- Unichain introduces a new block-building system called Rollup-Boost, developed with Flashbots, to improve block times and transaction fairness
- Users can stake UNI tokens and run nodes to verify network transactions, with 65% of net chain revenue allocated to validators and stakers
- Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell acknowledged concerns about crypto debanking and called for a "fresh look" at the issue
- Binance and SEC have filed a joint motion to pause their legal dispute for 60 days, potentially signaling a shift in regulatory approach
- OpenSea denied rumors about mandatory KYC for a potential token airdrop
- The Central African Republic's memecoin (CAR) collapsed 97% from its peak within two days of launch
